name: BotSociety, Inc.
description: Provider of online tools designed for previewing, prototyping and testing conversational interfaces. The company's online tools offer fastest way to create a bot experience preview, enabling users to create an online messaging service with the help of chatbot or online assistance.
one_liner: Provider of online tools designed for previewing, prototyping and testing conversational interfaces. The company's online tools offer fastest way to create a bot experience preview, enabling users to create an online messaging service with the help of chatbot or online assistance.
